sections.heading_text: How to use toolkits | ğŸ¦œï¸ğŸ”— LangChain

blocks.text: Toolkits are collections of tools that are designed to be used together for specific tasks. They have convenient loading methods.
All Toolkits expose a get_tools method which returns a list of tools. You can therefore do:

blocks.code: # Initialize a toolkittoolkit = ExampleTookit(...)# Get list of toolstools = toolkit.get_tools()# Create agentagent = create_agent_method(llm, tools, prompt)
